headline: US seeks information from Tesla on how it developed and verified whether Autopilot recall worked
summary: Federal highway safety investigators want Tesla to tell them how and why it developed the fix in a recall of more than 2 million vehicles equipped with the company's Autopilot partially automated driving system.  Investigators with the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration have concerns about whether the recall remedy worked because Tesla has reported 20 crashes since the remedy was sent out as an online software update in December.  The recall fix also was to address whether Autopilot should be allowed to operate on roads other than limited access highways.
